title: Europe has 'failed' in the face of Trump and Putin's ‘wrecking ball’ politics, top security official says
summary_full: The head of Europe’s biggest security forum said regional powers were “totally on the sidelines” of major discussions — but that it was their “own fault.”
summary_public: The head of Europe’s biggest security forum said regional powers were “totally on the sidelines” of major discussions — but that it was their “own fault.”
